meta.title: ZapClass - Transform Your Business with WhatsApp API

hero.title: Transform Your Business with WhatsApp API
hero.description: Connect, automate and grow your business with our powerful WhatsApp API platform. Includes exclusive courses to maximize your results.

stats.title: Trusted by Thousands
stats.description: Join the companies that are already transforming their businesses

features.title: Everything You Need to Succeed
features.description: From WhatsApp integration to exclusive courses, we provide all the tools your business needs to grow.

whatsappApi.title: WhatsApp API Integration
whatsappApi.description: Connect multiple WhatsApp accounts and automate messages with a powerful and reliable API.

completeApi.title: Complete API
completeApi.description: Full access to our API with webhooks, real-time monitoring and complete documentation.

exclusiveCourses.title: Exclusive Courses
exclusiveCourses.description: Learn to maximize your results with our library of exclusive courses on marketing and sales.

enterpriseSecurity.title: Enterprise Security
enterpriseSecurity.description: Your data is protected with the highest security standards used by large corporations.

highPerformance.title: High Performance
highPerformance.description: 99.9% guaranteed uptime with proprietary infrastructure to support large volumes.

specializedSupport.title: Specialized Support
specializedSupport.description: Our team of experts is ready to help you achieve the best results.

pricing.title: Choose Your Plan
pricing.description: Transparent pricing that grows with your business. All plans include our course library.
pricing.customPlanQuestion: Need a custom plan for your business?

contact.title: Ready to Get Started?
contact.description: Schedule a demonstration or contact our team to discover how ZapClass can transform your business.

quickResponse.title: Quick Response
quickResponse.description: We respond to all inquiries within 24 hours

personalizedDemo.title: Personalized Demo
personalizedDemo.description: Demonstration sessions customized to your business needs

footer.description: Transform your business with the most complete WhatsApp API and educational courses platform on the market.

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.backupScheduled: Backup scheduled for today at 11:00 PM

common.deleteWarning: This action cannot be undone. All associated data will be permanently removed.

whatsapp.title: WhatsApp
whatsapp.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this connection?
whatsapp.deleteWarning: This connection will be deleted. This action cannot be undone.
whatsapp.scanQRCode: Scan the QR code with your WhatsApp to connect
whatsapp.instanceActiveReady: Your instance is active and ready to use
whatsapp.waitingQRScan: Waiting for you to scan the QR Code
whatsapp.apiConnectionInfo: Connection information with API for this instance
whatsapp.tokenNotAvailable: Token not available. The instance may need to be recreated.
whatsapp.createConnectionDescription: Fill in the data to create a new WhatsApp connection
whatsapp.apiKeyNotAvailable: API Key not available. The instance may need to be recreated.
whatsapp.errorDeletingWebhook: Error deleting webhook. Please try again.

webhookDelete.confirmDescription: Are you sure you want to delete this webhook?
webhookDelete.warningDescription: This action cannot be undone. The webhook will be permanently removed and will stop receiving events.

webhooksIndex.heading: Webhooks
webhooksIndex.noWebhooksDescription: Start by adding your first webhook to receive real-time events

webhookForm.description: Configure the URL and events you want to receive
webhookForm.proxyDescription: Webhooks are received first by our server and then forwarded to your URL. This ensures security and allows additional filters.
webhookForm.urlHelper: This is your server URL where you will receive WhatsApp events
webhookForm.enabledDescription: When disabled, the webhook will not receive events
webhookForm.advancedDescription: Select specific events and message filters
webhookForm.eventsTooltip: Click on each event to see details. Events with â ï¸ generate high volume of requests.
webhookForm.eventsHelper: Click on events to select them. Hover to see details.
webhookForm.highVolumeWarningTitle: â ï¸ High volume events selected
webhookForm.highVolumePresence: presence: Can generate thousands of webhooks per day and overload your server.
webhookForm.highVolumeHistory: history: Can send hundreds of old messages at once.
webhookForm.highVolumeUseCarefully: â ï¸ Use only if really necessary.
webhookForm.defaultEventsTitle: Recommended events will be listened to
webhookForm.defaultEventsNote: ð¡ High volume events have been excluded. Enable Advanced mode if you need them.
webhookForm.loopProtectionDescription: API messages (wasSentByApi) automatically filtered. Enable Advanced mode to customize.
webhookForm.filtersTooltip: Use filters to EXCLUDE specific messages. Useful to avoid infinite loops.
webhookForm.filtersRecommendedDescription: We filter API messages to avoid loops. Customize the filters below.
webhookForm.filtersHelper: Select message types to EXCLUDE. Hover for details.
webhookForm.activeFiltersDescription: You will not receive webhooks for:
webhookForm.errorSaving: Error saving webhook. Please try again.
webhookForm.errorConflictNote: ð¡ These filters exclude opposite types of messages. Enabling both would mean no messages would be received.
webhookForm.conflictAutoRemove: When selecting this filter, the conflicting one will be automatically unchecked

paymentMethods.title: Payment Methods
paymentMethods.accountNotConfigured: Your account is not yet configured for payments.
paymentMethods.addNewCard: Add a new credit card for your subscriptions
paymentMethods.stripeRedirectInfo: To add a payment method, you will be redirected to a secure Stripe page where you can enter your card details securely.
paymentMethods.stripeRedirectToast: To add a payment method, you will be redirected to a secure Stripe page.
paymentMethods.addCardPrompt: Add a credit card to manage your subscriptions
paymentMethods.removeMethodDescription: Are you sure you want to remove this payment method? This action cannot be undone.
paymentMethods.removeDefaultWarning: Warning: This is your default payment method. Set another as default before removing.

invoiceHistory.title: Payment History
invoiceHistory.description: View and download your previous invoices
invoiceHistory.noInvoicesDescription: Your invoices will appear here as they are generated

infoList.automatic: Invoices are automatically generated at the start of each billing cycle
infoList.download: You can download PDF invoices for paid invoices at any time
infoList.failureNotification: In case of payment failure, you will receive an email notification
infoList.stripeStorage: All invoices are stored securely on Stripe

subscriptionsList.title: My Subscriptions
subscriptionsList.description: View and manage your active subscriptions
subscriptionsList.noSubscriptions: You don't have any active subscriptions yet.
subscriptionsList.cancelDialogTitle: Are you sure you want to cancel?
subscriptionsList.cancelDialogDescription: By cancelling your subscription, you will continue to have access to the features until the end of the already paid period. After that, your account will be deactivated.

billingIndex.heading: Billing & Subscriptions
billingIndex.description: Manage your subscriptions, payment methods and invoice history

cancel.title: Payment Cancelled
cancel.helpDescription: Contact us via WhatsApp or email. We're here to help you with any questions about our plans.

success.title: Payment Confirmed!
success.description: Your subscription has been successfully activated
success.nextStepsDescription: Explore the dashboard and start setting up your account. If you need help, our team is ready to assist you.

login.title: Log in to your account
login.description: Enter your email and password below to log in
login.emailRequired: Please enter a valid email address

register.description: Enter your details below to create your account
register.nameMinLength: Name must be at least 2 characters
register.emailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address
register.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 8 characters

forgotPassword.title: Forgot password
forgotPassword.description: Enter your email to receive a password reset link

resetPassword.title: Reset password
resetPassword.description: Please enter your new password below

confirmPassword.title: Confirm your password
confirmPassword.description: This is a secure area of the application. Please confirm your password before continuing.

verifyEmail.title: Verify email
verifyEmail.description: Please verify your email address by clicking on the link we just emailed to you.
verifyEmail.verificationSent: A new verification link has been sent to the email address you provided during registration.

profile.title: Profile settings
profile.heading: Profile information
profile.description: Update your name and email address
profile.resendVerification: Click here to resend the verification email.
profile.verificationSent: A new verification link has been sent to your email address.
profile.nameMinLength: Name must be at least 2 characters
profile.emailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address

password.title: Password settings

password.description: Ensure your account is using a long, random password to stay secure
